message.content: {"id": "17894", "title": "Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults", "description": "", "OB": "When the Open Mode preference is changed to Single Click and both checkboxes are selected, restoring defaults does not reset the preference to Double Click and clear the checkboxes.", "EB": "In Build 20020521, I went to Workbench preferences and changed the Open Mode to Single Click. I also selected both checkboxes. However, when I clicked on 'Restore Defaults', the Open Mode preference did not revert to Double Click and the checkboxes were not cleared.", "SR": "When 'Restore Defaults' is selected, the Open Mode preference should revert to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared."}
